frameDefinitions: Words in this frame describe acts in violation of a legal code.
These are words describing situations in which a Perpetrator takes Goods from a  Victim or a Source.
This frame contains general words for Individuals, i.e. humans, whose specific acts or general behavior is evaluated against standards of morality or rightness.
A Perpetrator intentionally sets fire to his own or someone else's property, often in order to collect an insurance payment on this property.
A Wrongdoer engages in a Misdeed.
frameExamples: He was accused of <t><fex name='Offense'>hijacking</fex></t> a tour bus full of people.
I can't believe he <t>pickpocketed</t> my gold watch !
Columbus: Was he a Hero or a <t>Villain</t>?
You have <t>sinned</t> for the last time, Stephen!
listRoleDefinitions: This role denotes the person or entity that is badly affected by the <fen>Offense</fen>.
The individual who commits the Offense
<fen>Perpetrator</fen> is the person (or other agent) that takes the goods away.
<fen>Victim</fen> is the person (or other sentient being or group) that owns the goods before they are taken away by the perpetrator.
<fen>Goods</fen> is anything (including labor, time, or legal rights) that can be taken away.
<fen>Source</fen> is the initial location of the goods, before they change location.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the theft occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the theft occurs.
The illegal setting of fire to destroy something.
The <fen>Perpetrator</fen> sets fire to a building in order to gain some benefit from so doing.
<fen>Victim</fen> identifies the enity that is negatively effected by the arson.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the arson occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the arson occurs.
This is the person whose <fen>Misdeed</fen> is being judged with respect to its morality.
The assessment of the <fen>Wrongdoer</fen> is based on his or her <fen>Misdeed</fen>.
The time at which a <fen>Misdeed</fen> is performed.
listRoleExamples: The police is investigating the homicide <fex>of Dr. Johnson</fex>.
Leslie stole the watch <fex>from the table</fex>.
Leslie STOLE the watch from Kim <fex>at dusk</fex>.
Leslie STOLE the watch from Kim <fex>in the park</fex>.
<fex>The two men</fex> were charged with arson when found running from the burning factory.
There has been an increase in the number of  arson attacks <fex>on local schools</fex>.
The misdeeds <fex>of the previous evening</fex> were all forgotten now.
Sexual peccadilloes <fex>in the White House</fex> are one thing, lying before Congress quite another.
